patches.content:
Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -51,9 +51,9 @@
     background-color: black;
 }
 
 .player {
-    background-image: url('assetcharacter.png'); /* Path to your character image */
+    background-image: url('Asset Managercharacter.png'); /* Path to your character image */
     background-size: 130%; /* Scale the image to fit the cell */
     background-position: center; /* Center the image */
     background-repeat: no-repeat; /* Prevent the image from repeating */
 }
